content.question: Which of the following is a characteristic of tropical rain forests?

choices.label: They rarely receive more than 100 centimeters of rain per year.
Their soils typically have a high pH.
Their soils are relatively poor in nutrients.
They do not exhibit a great deal of species diversity.
They generally occur in the rain shadows of mountain ranges.

content.answer: Their soils are relatively poor in nutrients.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe environmental concepts and processes.
